metadata.synopsis: Minsc reacts with anger after seeing Naheira die
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_Actrl-shift-7Recruit Jaheiractrl-shift-7-> Minsc-> Abandoned CIstern-> Go to Roah BribeFight the fight kill Naheira

0.speaker: Minsc
0.context: NodeContext: Minsc is raging - his Stone Lord persona should be genuinely frightening. The player has just killed the doppelganger pretending to be Jaheira.

1.speaker: Minsc
1.text: What...? Jaheira, you look a little... strangesome...
1.context: NodeContext: Mid-battle, 'Jaheira' was just killed before you but she morphed back into doppelganger form. Still fighting under the influence of the Absolute, but confused - a hint player is going in the right direction to save him
